body.-scriptCode: var url = space.new_image_picture_nasa.GalleryURL; var title = space.new_image_picture_nasa.ImageTitle; var preview_text = space.new_image_picture_nasa.Description; IosReadingList.createReadingListItem.setUrl(url); IosReadingList.createReadingListItem.setTitle(title); IosReadingList.createReadingListItem.setPreviewText(preview_text);

trigger.name: new_image_picture_nasa
trigger.ingredients: {"GalleryURL":"http://www.nasa.gov/content/antares-rocket-with-cygnus-spacecraft-launches", "ImageTitle":"Antares Rocket With Cygnus Spacecraft Launches", "Description":"The Orbital Sciences Corporation Antares rocket, with the Cygnus cargo spacecraft aboard"}
